light_cleaned_title: Today I denied providing my Aadhaar details to a SH^tty courier service
light_cleaned_selftext: I had a ceiling mounted LED light in my room for past 5-6 years. Its from a brand called Pasolite. I searched online , and it was not available on amazon , so placed an order directly on Pasolite website. Cant say its cheap , but here a screenshot.. ​ [https://i.imgur.com/eRdCO9y.png](https://i.imgur.com/eRdCO9y.png) ​ By evening , i got call from pasolite CC that the courier service (GT COURIER- IIRC) is asking for my aadhaar. I politely denied to provide any further details beyond my address and phone number. I also told them , one what basis is the courier service is asking for that detail ? The CC even though felt that its wrong , was asking me to provide (thinking the issue will resolve smoothly). ​ She also told that whether a pickup at nearby electrical shop would be possible , but none were close to me and since i have paid a hefty shipping charge , why should i spend more to get the item ? ​ She then said ,she then has to change to different courier (DTC) but it will incur extra shipping charges , to which i denied , that i wont be paying anymore extra. ​ After some back and forth - TOTAL WASTE OF MY TIME!! ​ A senior CC called me and asked what happened... i explained , he said he will look into it and the first CC called me and said things will be resolved. ​ Giving me number wont take fraction of a minute but why ? ​ Why as a individual private buyer should provide such detail ? that too for a courier service ? ​ Does this courier service guy know thats illegal to get the aadhaar details ? ​ Why should a good company like pasolite bend for a shitty courier service and sacrifice its customers privacy ?
